name: Enoxaparin Sodium

indications.text: enoxaparin sodium injection , usp low molecular weight heparin ( lmwh ) indicated : • prophylaxis deep vein thrombosis ( dvt ) abdominal surgery , hip replacement surgery , knee replacement surgery , medical patients severely restricted mobility acute illness ( 1.1 ) • inpatient treatment acute dvt without pulmonary embolism ( 1.2 ) • outpatient treatment acute dvt without pulmonary embolism ( 1.2 ) • prophylaxis ischemic complications unstable angina non-q-wave myocardial infarction ( myocardial infarction ) ( 1.3 ) • treatment acute st-segment elevation myocardial infarction ( stemi ) managed medically subsequent percutaneous coronary intervention ( pci ) ( 1.4 )

warningsAndPrecautions: enoxaparin sodium injection , usp available two concentrations ( tables 26 27 ) : table 26 : 100 mg/ml concentration unit/strength strength represents number milligrams enoxaparin sodium water injection . enoxaparin sodium injection , usp 30 mg 40 mg prefilled syringes , 60 mg , 80 mg , 100 mg graduated prefilled syringes contain 10 mg enoxaparin sodium per 0.1 ml water injection . anti-xa activity approximate anti-factor xa activity based reference w.h.o . first international low molecular weight heparin reference standard . package size ( per carton ) label color ndc # single-dose prefilled syringes enoxaparin sodium injection , usp prefilled syringe single , one-time affixed 27 gauge × 1/2-inch needle . 30 mg/0.3 ml 3000 iu overbagged 5 x 0.3 ml syringes bag medium blue 55154-3540-5 40 mg/0.4 ml 4000 iu overbagged 5 x 0.4 ml syringes bag yellow 55154-3541-5 single-dose graduated prefilled syringes 60 mg/0.6 ml 6000 iu overbagged 5 x 0.6 ml syringes bag orange 55154-3542-5 80 mg/0.8 ml 8000 iu overbagged 5 x 0.8 ml syringes bag brown 55154-3543-5 100 mg/ml 10,000 iu overbagged 5 x 1 ml syringes bag black 55154-3544-5 store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . store original carton packaging ready .
adverseReactions: enoxaparin sodium injection contraindicated patients : •active major bleeding . •history immune-mediated heparin-induced thrombocytopenia ( hit ) within past 100 days presence circulating antibodies [ ( 5.4 ) ] . •known hypersensitivity enoxaparin sodium ( e.g . , pruritus , urticaria , anaphylactic/anaphylactoid ) [ ( 6.2 ) ] . •known hypersensitivity heparin pork products .
indications_original: Enoxaparin sodium injection, USP is a low molecular weight heparin (LMWH) indicated for: • Prophylaxis of deep vein thrombosis (DVT) in abdominal surgery, hip replacement surgery, knee replacement surgery, or medical patients with severely restricted mobility during acute illness ( 1.1 ) • Inpatient treatment of acute DVT with or without pulmonary embolism ( 1.2 ) • Outpatient treatment of acute DVT without pulmonary embolism ( 1.2 ) • Prophylaxis of ischemic complications of unstable angina and non-Q-wave myocardial infarction (MI) ( 1.3 ) • Treatment of acute ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction (STEMI) managed medically or with subsequent percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) ( 1.4 )
contraindications_original: See full prescribing information for dosing and administration information. ( 2 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Enoxaparin sodium injection, USP is available in two concentrations (see Tables 26 and 27):
                  
                     Table 26: 100 mg/mL Concentration
                     
                     
                     
                     
                     
                     
                        
                           
                              Dosage Unit/Strength
                              Strength represents the number of milligrams of enoxaparin sodium in Water for Injection. Enoxaparin sodium injection, USP 30 mg and 40 mg prefilled syringes, and 60 mg, 80 mg, and 100 mg graduated prefilled syringes each contain 10 mg enoxaparin sodium per 0.1 mL Water for Injection.
                           
                           
                              Anti-Xa Activity
                              Approximate anti-Factor Xa activity based on reference to the W.H.O. First International Low Molecular Weight Heparin Reference Standard.

                                 Single-Dose Prefilled Syringes
                                 Each enoxaparin sodium injection, USP prefilled syringe is for single, one-time use only and is affixed with a 27 gauge × 1/2-inch needle.

                  Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  Store in the original carton or packaging until ready to use.
adverseReactions_original:
Enoxaparin sodium injection is contraindicated in patients with:
                  
                     
                        •Active major bleeding.
                     
                        •History of immune-mediated heparin-induced thrombocytopenia (HIT) within the past 100 days or in the presence of circulating antibodies [see Warnings and Precautions (5.4)].
                     
                        •Known hypersensitivity to enoxaparin sodium (e.g., pruritus, urticaria, anaphylactic/anaphylactoid reactions) [see Adverse Reactions (
                           6.2
                           )].
                     
                        •Known hypersensitivity to heparin or pork products.
